author: ekoneil
msg: - add action and href support to the pager

- start switching the literal/anchor/image columns over to use the core HTML tag rendering infrastructure.  For example, the <netui:image> and <netui-data:imageColumn> tags share the same core HTML rendering engine that supports both HTML and XHTML.
- add URL creation to the JspUtil class.  This code was taken from the <netui:anchor> tag and the two will be merged later.

author: akarasulu
msg: added empty context specifc tlv for controls

author: ekoneil
msg: The globalApp > sharedFlow change caused this test to diff in the error reported when the expression evaluation failed.

author: crossley
msg: Minor text tweaks to make the requirements not sound so onerous.
